message.raw: Fixed bug where restarting would break because there was no element in self.event_args when the mainloop pulled the signal to restart out of the event queue. Now it only looks for args after it's already worked out that it's not going to restart.
message.html: Fixed bug where restarting would break because there was no element in self.event_args when the mainloop pulled the signal to restart out of the event queue. Now it only looks for args after it's already worked out that it's not going to restart.

summary.html: Fixed bug where restarting would break because there was no element in self.event_args when the mainloop pulled the signal to restart out of the event queue. Now it only looks for args after it's already worked out that it's not going to restart.

message: Fixed bug where restarting would break because there was no element in self.event_args when the mainloop pulled the signal to restart out of the event queue. Now it only looks for args after it's already worked out that it's not going to restart.
